Interface ResolverAdapter

All Known Subinterfaces:
VersionsHelper
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultResolverAdapter, DefaultVersionsHelper
public interface ResolverAdapter
A thin adapter over RepositorySystem to help discover available versions for provided artifacts.
Since:
2.20.0

  • Method Details

    • resolveArtifact

      void resolveArtifact(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact artifact, boolean usePluginRepositories) throws org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactResolutionException
      Attempts to resolve the artifact. If the artifact cannot be resolved, an ArtifactResolutionException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      artifact - The artifact to resolve.
      usePluginRepositories - whether to resolve from the plugin repositories or the regular repositories.
      Throws:
      org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactResolutionException - if resolution is unsuccessful
      Since:
      2.20.0

    • resolveArtifactVersions

      ArtifactVersions resolveArtifactVersions(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact artifact, boolean usePluginRepositories, boolean useProjectRepositories) throws VersionRetrievalException
      Returns all available versions of the specified artifact that are available in either the local repository, or the appropriate remote repositories. The resulting ArtifactVersions instance will contain all versions, including snapshots, regardless of the version range specified in the artifact.
      Parameters:
      artifact - The artifact to look for versions of.
      usePluginRepositories - true will consult the pluginRepositories
      useProjectRepositories - true will consult regular project repositories
      Returns:
      The details of the available artifact versions.
      Throws:
      VersionRetrievalException - thrown if version resolution fails
      Since:
      2.15.0

    • resolveDependencyVersions

      SortedMap<org.apache.maven.model.Dependency, ArtifactVersions> resolveDependencyVersions(Collection<org.apache.maven.model.Dependency> dependencies, boolean usePluginRepositories, boolean useProjectRepositories) throws VersionRetrievalException

      Returns a sorted map of all possible updates per dependency. The map keys are sorted using DependencyComparator, which boils down to sorting by and groupId:artifactId:classifier.

      The returned map is sorted by groupId:artifactId:classifier.

      Version retrieval is done in parallel, using LOOKUP_PARALLEL_THREADS threads.

      Parameters:
      dependencies - a collection of Dependency instances to look up.
      usePluginRepositories - true will consult the pluginRepositories
      useProjectRepositories - true will consult regular project repositories
      Returns:
      map containing the ArtifactVersions object per dependency sorted by groupId, artifactId, classifier
      Throws:
      VersionRetrievalException - thrown if a version cannot be retrieved

    • resolvePluginVersions

      PluginUpdatesDetails resolvePluginVersions(org.apache.maven.model.Plugin plugin) throws VersionRetrievalException
      Looks up the updates for a plugin. The resulting PluginUpdatesDetails instance will only contain versions that are newer than the current version of the plugin.
      Parameters:
      plugin - The Plugin instance to look up.
      Returns:
      The plugin update details.
      Throws:
      VersionRetrievalException - thrown if version resolution fails
      Since:
      1.0-beta-1

    • resolvePluginVersions

      SortedMap<org.apache.maven.model.Plugin, PluginUpdatesDetails> resolvePluginVersions(Collection<org.apache.maven.model.Plugin> plugins) throws VersionRetrievalException

      Looks up the updates for a set of plugins. The resulting PluginUpdatesDetails instance per plugin will only contain versions that are newer than the current version of the plugin.

      The returned map is sorted by groupId:artifactId:classifier.

      Parameters:
      plugins - A collection of Plugin instances to look up.
      Returns:
      A map, keyed by plugin, with values of type PluginUpdatesDetails.
      Throws:
      VersionRetrievalException - thrown if version resolution fails
      Since:
      1.0-beta-1
